channel.title: sysops on GrooveStomp
channel.description: Recent content in sysops on GrooveStomp

item.title: VPS Learning
item.description: Today we learn how little I know about system administration. I host most of my own “cloud” services on a VPS I rent from SSDNodes. Recently I purchased an upgraded KVM node for reasons of which I’ll get into later. Anyway, I ran into a hiccup while trying to start migrating from my older VPS. └─ curl 142.44.184.204 curl: (56) Recv failure: Connection reset by peer Hmm. NOTE: First of all, I know the machine is reachable because I can SSH into it.
